name: Law of Dispute
description:
【Game Introduction】

This is a medieval realistic style auto chess + card roguelike strategy game.
● Mild strategy auto chess card battles
● Asynchronous battles and friend battles anytime, anywhere ● Rich and easy-to-use deck construction ● Grand and complete world view and story background
● Unique story mode
● High-quality hand-drawn art style

【Gameplay Introduction】 We hope to create a game that is simple and fun, yet also has a complete story world view, integrating innovation to create this unique casual gameplay.
● Gameplay Players will construct and adjust their lineup decks on a 3*2 battlefield before each match, and the match will be presented in the form of auto chess automatic battles. As the match progresses, players need to continuously obtain new cards to replace and upgrade the cards in their lineup, building a stronger lineup to achieve ultimate victory. It offers rich strategic depth while reducing the complexity of traditional card battle games.
● Card Design The game features a wide variety of characters and items. Rich cards not only bring randomness but also support the game's plot; various different cards can be freely combined, allowing players to create unique play styles. In the initial design, we have created five major factions: the Empire of Casnia, the Kingdom of Kortland, the Church of Shias, the Desert Khanate, and the Chaos Tribe, presenting players with hundreds of unique cards and items.
● Game Modes The game offers four play modes: Adventure Mode, Story Mode, Mirror Mode, and Confrontation Mode.

Adventure Mode uses asynchronous battles, allowing players to start or pause the game at their own pace.
Quick Mode offers shorter rounds for a more intense battle experience.
Story Mode allows players to learn about the continent and the stories behind each card during the game.
Mirror Mode records every winning lineup in confrontation mode. Confrontation Mode allows players to engage in real-time game matches online or with friends using LAN.
